actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 1739 ordered to be reported.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to maintain and rehabilitate the New York State Barge Canal and for other purposes.

summary.text: Erie Canal Maintenance Act of 1983 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to maintain and rehabilitate the New York State Barge Canal. Requires the State of New York to operate the canal and to pay at least one-half of its annual cost. Defines the New York State Barge Canal for the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army to maintain and rehabilitate the New York State Barge Canal and for other purposes.
